notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, A.S. (Agnieszka Szopa), P.K., H.E., A.K. and M.L.; methodology, P.K., A.S. (Agnieszka Szopa), A.K., N.M., A.S. (Alicja Synowiec) and A.M.; formal analysis, P.K., A.S. (Agnieszka Szopa), A.S. (Alicja Synowiec), A.K., H.E., M.G. and M.L.; investigation, P.K., A.S. (Agnieszka Szopa), A.K., N.M., M.F.T., S.C., M.G. and A.S. (Alicja Synowiec), data curation, A.S. (Agnieszka Szopa), P.K., N.M. and A.S. (Alicja Synowiec); writingâ€”original draft preparation, A.S. (Agnieszka Szopa), P.K., A.K., N.M., A.S. (Alicja Synowiec) and H.E.; visualization, P.K., A.K. and A.S. (Agnieszka Szopa); funding acquisition, P.K., H.O.E. and O.N.; critical revision of the manuscript: H.E., J.P., A.S. (Agnieszka Szopa), M.L. and A.K.; contributed in writing and formatting the final version: A.S. (Agnieszka Szopa), A.K., N.M., M.F.T., M.L., H.E., H.O.E., E.A.M., D.O.E.-A. and O.N. All authors participated in conducting experiments, writing and approving the final manuscript. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
